Questions.Label: What type of apprenticeship training will your organisation offer?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Apprenticeship frameworks were replaced by apprenticeship standards on 1 August 2020.

Existing apprentices on frameworks will still be able to complete the framework, providing they started on or before 31 July 2020.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us what type of apprenticeship training your organisation will offer

Questions.Label: Tell us how your organisation is ready to deliver training in apprenticeship standards
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
You must include how your organisation has:

  • commitment and approval from senior managers to deliver apprenticeship standards
  • a governance group in place to monitor delivery of training
  • an implementation plan specific to apprenticeship training
  • resources that support the delivery of apprenticeship standards

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us how your organisation is ensuring it's ready to deliver training in apprenticeship standards

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: Your answer must be 275 words or less

Questions.Label: Does your organisation have a plan to transition from apprenticeship frameworks to apprenticeship standards?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Apprenticeship frameworks will be replaced by apprenticeship standards on 1 August 2020.

Existing apprentices on frameworks will still be able to complete the framework, providing they started on or before 31 July 2020.

Find out more on the withdrawal of apprenticeship frameworks (opens in a new window or tab).

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation has a plan to transition from apprenticeship frameworks to apprenticeship standards

Questions.Label: How will your organisation transition from apprenticeship frameworks to apprenticeship standards?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Your answer must include how your organisation will:

  • get commitment and approval from senior managers to deliver apprenticeship standards
  • have a governance group in place to monitor delivery of training
  • have an implementation plan specific to apprenticeship training
  • have resources that support the delivery of apprenticeship standards

Your answer must also include:

  • when your organisation will transition from frameworks to standards
  • what sectors you're delivering frameworks in

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us how your organisation will transition from apprenticeship frameworks to apprenticeship standards

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: Your answer must be 275 words or less

Pages.Title: Why will your organisation only deliver apprenticeship frameworks?
Pages.LinkTitle: Why will your organisation only deliver apprenticeship frameworks?

Questions.Label: Why will your organisation only deliver apprenticeship frameworks?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Your answer must include:

  • a brief summary of why your organisation does not have a plan to transition to apprenticeship standards.
  • what sectors you're delivering frameworks in

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us why your organisation will only deliver apprenticeship frameworks

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: Your answer must be 150 words or less

Pages.Title: How will your organisation engage with end-point assessment organisations (EPAOs)?
Pages.LinkTitle: How will your organisation engage with end-point assessment organisations (EPAOs)?

Questions.Label: How will your organisation engage with end-point assessment organisations (EPAOs)?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Your answer must include how your organisation will:

  • find EPAOs for relevant apprenticeship standards
  • contact EPAOs
  • engage employers in the process of choosing an EPAO
  • confirm a contract or service agreement with EPAOs
  • engage EPAOs throughout the apprenticeship journey
  • ensure the EPAO is suitable, by including what information you will ask from them
  • ensure End Point Assessments are booked within the timescales published in the apprenticeship funding rules

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us how your organisation will engage with end-point assessment organisations (EPAOs)

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: Your answer must be 275 words or less

Pages.Title: How will your organisation plan to engage and work with awarding bodies?
Pages.LinkTitle: How will your organisation plan to engage and work with awarding bodies?

Questions.Label: How will your organisation plan to engage and work with awarding bodies?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Your answer must include how your organisation will:

  • find awarding bodies for relevant apprenticeship frameworks
  • contact awarding bodies
  • get relevant information from awarding bodies
  • engage employers in the process of choosing an awarding body
  • confirm a contract or service agreement with awarding bodies
  • ensure the awarding body is suitable, by including what information you will ask from them

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us how your organisation plans to engage and work with awarding bodies

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: Your answer must be 275 words or less
